unit.select: select * from tc_mantic_personas where lower(nombres)= lower('{nombres}') and lower(paterno)= lower('{paterno}') and lower(materno)= lower('{materno}')
select tc_mantic_categorias.id_categoria as id_key, tc_mantic_categorias.* from tc_mantic_categorias where {condicion} order by clave, nivel
select * from tc_mantic_categorias where clave = '{clave}' order by clave, nivel
select tc_mantic_categorias.id_categoria as id_key, tc_mantic_categorias.* from tc_mantic_categorias where nombre like '%{nombre}%' and descripcion like '%{descripcion}%' order by clave, nivel
